suncertify.common
Interface DataFacade

All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteDataFacade
All Known Implementing Classes:
DataAdapter, RemoteDataFacadeImpl, RemoteDataFacadeImpl_Stub
public interface DataFacade

Interface exposed to the client to communicate both locally and remotely

Method Detail

remoteBookOperation

public boolean remoteBookOperation(java.lang.String customerNo,
                                   Record oldRecord)
                            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   AlreadyBookedException
Performs a full booking operation (book / unbooking). Sequence is lock record, read it, compare it with the old record (how it was before booking) and book it if it has not been changed by another client

Parameters:
customerNo - the customer who is booking, empty if it is an unbook operation
oldRecord - the record,how it was read from the database
Returns:
true if operation was successful,false otherwise
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException
RemoteException
AlreadyBookedException
java.io.IOException

retrieveRecord

public Record retrieveRecord(int recNo)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             RecordNotFoundException
Retrieves a record

Parameters:
recNo - position of the record in the file
Returns:
an instance of Record filled with data from the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException
RecordNotFoundException

getRecordList

public java.util.List getRecordList(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                    java.lang.String cityName,
                                    boolean refreshCache)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    RecordNotFoundException
Retrieves a list of records which match the given search criteria

Parameters:
hotelName - the hotel name search criteria
cityName - the city search criteria
refreshCache - whether we have to reload data from the cache
Returns:
a list containing all the records which match the search criteria
Throws:
java.io.IOException
RecordNotFoundException

          throws java.io.IOException
Dummy method to make sure the object exists (when working remotely)

Throws:
java.io.IOException
